name: The Rescue of Mermaids
description:
StoryIn The Rescue of Mermaids, you play Garry, a rare human-looking creature who can become into octopus when aroused (eromorph). Garry has three mermaid companions accompanying him on his journey to find a new planet to call home, but when they finally find an ideal planet, the mermaids simply disappear into the shadows. Now he needs to figure out how to rescue them and ensure peace and security for his lineage.

Will he be able to rescue his companions in time? Or will he fail and have to live with that guilt for the rest of his life?SystemThe game is a 2d side scrolling platform with bomberman-like battle, the purpose of the game is to rescue three mermaids wherever they are and guarantee peace for their lineage of octopus-men, depending on your progress you will influence the ending.
  • Monster Girls
  • Animated CG
  • Collectable cards of the Monster Girls
  • 2 Stages
  • 1 Endings
  • And many secrets in the depths of the ocean
